title: Ore wa Mada, Honki o Dashite Inai - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Romance   Slice of Life
tags: Adapted to Manga   Adopted Children   Clever Protagonist   Emotionally Weak Protagonist   Family   Fantasy World   Genius Protagonist   Incest   Male Protagonist   Nobles   Polygamy   Prostit**es   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Royalty

description: Weird development where the main character, who is the fourth son of a noble household and is called the stain of nobility, has to inherit the house because his three brothers were conveniently in the same party and all died to a meteorite apparently. The older sister who's left disowns herself and instead registers herself as his foster daughter and now she calls him dad all to get the him to head the house and have him demonstrate his true ability.>
